channel.title: FoL the 18th One. HOSTED BY YOUR UNCLE - GAME END - Cult and Fanatic Victory
channel.description:
## Welcome to FoL 18.
# Endgame sheet https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1RieSMgSNkZLP28IdoVdpsJvBGgJGvH0d03InJOY6Zsk/edit?usp=drivesdk
### After Adiart had a meme war and I didnt get to host several games for months. I am finally ready to host Fol 18. To do this I will use the help of ~~your credit card~~ @Insanity. Hey Marl, up my paycheck or I'll moderror the entire game. The war of the turtles and the nerbins have started.
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Forum DM Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Forum DM All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-cards-for-forum-based-tol/249) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial everyone may vote to execute or pardon. The King may decide fate while somebody is on trial. Executions end the Day Trials DO NOT pause the counter
### After The Night You will be told what happened to you. If nothing important had happened regarding you, you will get a generic slept peacefully message.
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: **King** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]/[color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]/[color=darkred]Random Cult[/color]** **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color=steblue]Sheriff/Paladin[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Investigator[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color] / [color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color] / [color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]**
Living Players: 1. **The Mole that lives on my Leg** :crown: 2. **Firekitten** 4. **Frostwolf** 5. **Luxy** 8. **Boodoop** 10. **RadiatedDonkey (burito)** 11. **Squid** 13. **Sam**
### Graveyard:
### Spectatoes :potato: * Potatocenary * Meteotato * GamerPotato * Nerbtato * Livipotato
### Backups: 1. NozKais 2. Planterror
### Graveyard: **Our Messiah, Marl - Died Night 1 - [color=steblue]The Prince[/color]** **Isaac_Gonzalez - Executed Day 2 - [color=steblue]The Knight[/color]** **Hjasik - Died night 2 - [color=steblue]The Physician[/color]** **Geyde - Died Night 2 - [color=steblue]The Knight[/color]** **eevee - Died night 2 - [color=steblue]The Physician[/color]** **techwolves - Modkilled Day 3 - [color=black]The Reaper[/color]** **BlueStorm - Executed Day 3 - [color=red]The Devil[/color]** **MaximusPrime - Executed Day 4 - [color=steblue]The Paladin[/color]**
## Timestamps: [Day 1 - All Hail King Moleland](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-confirmation-stage/73668/183?u=pug)
[Day 2 - The Prince and the Plague ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-night-one-knowledge-of-timelines/73668/427?u=pug) [The Trial of Isaac_Gonzalez](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-day-2-the-prince-and-the-plague-15-16/73668/1755?u=pug) [Night 2 - Good Knight Isaac](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-night-2-good-knight-isaac-15-16/73668/1957?u=pug)
[Day 3 - Blue Dead Redemption](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-day-3-blue-dead-redemption-11-16/73668/1957?u=pug) [The Trial of BlueStorm](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-day-4-peaceful-workout-9-16/73668/2078?u=pug) [Modkill of Techwolves - Modreaped](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-day-3-modreaped-10-16/73668/2504?u=pug) [Night 3 - CHAOS CHAOS](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-day-3-modreaped-10-16/73668/2511?u=pug)
[Day 4 - Peaceful Workout](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-night-3-chaos-chaos-9-16/73668/2522?u=pug) [The Trial of MaximusPrime](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-day-4-peaceful-workout-9-16/73668/2612?u=pug) [Night 4 - The Last Stand](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-day-4-peaceful-workout-9-16/73668/2797?u=pug)[quote="Pug, post:1, topic:73668, full:true"] ## Welcome to FoL 18.
### After Adiart had a meme war and I didnt get to host several games for months. I am finally ready to host Fol 18. To do this I will use the help of ~~your credit card~~ @Insanity. Hey Marl, up my paycheck or I'll moderror the entire game. The war of the turtles and the nerbins have started.
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Forum DM Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Forum DM All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-cards-for-forum-based-tol/249) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial everyone may vote to execute or pardon. The King may decide fate while somebody is on trial. Executions end the Day Trials DO NOT pause the counter
### After The Night You will be told what happened to you. If nothing important had happened regarding you, you will get a generic slept peacefully message.
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: **King** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]/[color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]/[color=darkred]Random Cult[/color]** **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color=steblue]Sheriff/Paladin[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Investigator[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color] / [color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color] / [color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]**
Living Players: 1. **The Mole that lives on my Leg** :crown: 2. **Firekitten** 4. **Frostwolf** 5. **Luxy** 8. **Boodoop** 10. **RadiatedDonkey (burito)** 11. **Squid** 13. **Sam**
### Graveyard:
### Spectatoes :potato: * Potatocenary * Meteotato * GamerPotato * Nerbtato * Livipotato
### Backups: 1. NozKais 2. Planterror
### Graveyard: **Our Messiah, Marl - Died Night 1 - [color=steblue]The Prince[/color]** **Isaac_Gonzalez - Executed Day 2 - [color=steblue]The Knight[/color]** **Hjasik - Died night 2 - [color=steblue]The Physician[/color]** **Geyde - Died Night 2 - [color=steblue]The Knight[/color]** **eevee - Died night 2 - [color=steblue]The Physician[/color]** **techwolves - Modkilled Day 3 - [color=black]The Reaper[/color]** **BlueStorm - Executed Day 3 - [color=red]The Devil[/color]** **MaximusPrime - Executed Day 4 - [color=steblue]The Paladin[/color]**
## Timestamps: [Day 1 - All Hail King Moleland](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-confirmation-stage/73668/183?u=pug)
[Day 2 - The Prince and the Plague ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-night-one-knowledge-of-timelines/73668/427?u=pug) [The Trial of Isaac_Gonzalez](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-day-2-the-prince-and-the-plague-15-16/73668/1755?u=pug) [Night 2 - Good Knight Isaac](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-the-18th-one-hosted-by-your-uncle-night-2-good-knight-isaac-15-16/73668/1957?u=pug)
